alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 7:50PM PST until December 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches above 5000 feet and 10 to 12 inches above 7000 feet. Winds could gust in excess of 60 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains and Sheep Range. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Highways 157, 158, and 159 will be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will continue to rise today as precipitation begins, but will drop this evening to around 4000 feet, at which point, precipitation will largely fall as snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
